sentences.sContent: When millions watch the same programs, the whole world becomes a village, and society is reduced to the condition which obtain in preliterate communities.
sentences.sContent_eng: When millions watch the same programs, the whole world becomes a village, and society is reduced to the condition which obtain in preliterate communities.
sentences.sCn: 当数以百万计的人们观看同一电视节目时，整个世界成了一个小村庄，社会退化到文字出现前状况。

sentences.sContent: When millions watch the same programs, the whole world becomes a village, and society is reduced to the conditions which obtain in preliterate communities.
sentences.sContent_eng: When millions watch the same programs, the whole world becomes a village, and society is reduced to the conditions which obtain in preliterate communities.
sentences.sCn: 当数以百万计的人观看着相同的电视节目的时候，整个世界就变成了一个村落，社会也就退化到文字出现前的状态。
